_header: This word that we Pater call
Note: Cf. lines 369-372 of the Speculum Vitae (423).
_description: Four lines on the significance of ‘Pater’ — two couplets

CamTH16.Transcription:
This Worde þat we Pater calleAskes of vs his chylder
                    alleLuf and drede and obedyenceSeruyce honour &
                    reuerence
CamTH16.Editions:
James,  Montague Rhodes. 
             A Descriptive Catalogue of the Manuscripts in the Library of Trinity
                Hall, Cambridge.
         Cambridge: at the UP, 1907: 34.
